column1: Renewable Energy and Power Systems Management MSc
column5: Key informationThis programme will give you an in-depth insight into the technical workings, management and economics of the electrical power industry. Building on your undergraduate degree your MSc will give you the opportunity to pursue a variety of roles across the energy sector.Course overviewThis course has been designed for both practising engineers and those considering a career in engineering. It will provide you with an in-depth insight into the technical workings, management and economics of the electrical power industry.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years (up to 28 months) part time
